Class ElementCollection

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core.Elements
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

An observable collection of canvas elements with typed accessors and lookup methods.

public class ElementCollection : ObservableCollection<ICanvasElement>, IList<ICanvasElement>, ICollection<ICanvasElement>, IReadOnlyList<ICanvasElement>, IReadOnlyCollection<ICanvasElement>, IEnumerable<ICanvasElement>, IList, ICollection, IEnumerable, INotifyCollectionChanged, INotifyPropertyChanged

Remarks

This collection is the core data structure for the canvas-first architecture. It holds all elements (nodes, edges, shapes, etc.) and provides efficient lookup and filtering methods.

Supports batch operations via AddRange(IEnumerable<ICanvasElement>) for efficient bulk updates.

Properties

Gets all elements sorted by Z-index (rendering order).

public IEnumerable<ICanvasElement> ByZIndex { get; }

Gets the count of edges in the collection. O(1) operation.

Property Value

int

Edges

Gets all edge elements in the collection. PERFORMANCE: Returns cached list for O(1) access instead of O(n) OfType filtering.

public IReadOnlyList<Edge> Edges { get; }

Adds a range of elements without firing individual notifications. A single Reset notification is fired after all elements are added.

GetEdgesForNode(string)

Gets all edges connected to a specific node (either as source or target). PERFORMANCE: O(1) lookup using edge index instead of O(n) iteration.

public IEnumerable<Edge> GetEdgesForNode(string nodeId)

Parameters

nodeId string

The ID of the node to find edges for.

Returns

IEnumerable<Edge>

Enumerable of edges connected to the node.

GetEdgesForNodes(IEnumerable<string>)

Gets all edges connected to any of the specified nodes. PERFORMANCE: O(k) where k is number of connected edges, instead of O(n) iteration over all edges.

public List<Edge> GetEdgesForNodes(IEnumerable<string> nodeIds)

Parameters

nodeIds IEnumerable<string>

The IDs of nodes to find edges for.

Returns

List<Edge>

List of distinct edges connected to any of the specified nodes.
